description: Try our easy to follow Deep-Fried Whole Prawns With Lime Chilli Salt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Deep-Fried Whole Prawns With Lime Chilli Salt
name: Deep-Fried Whole Prawns With Lime Chilli Salt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok or saucepan over medium heat. Cook prawns, in batches, for 2-3 minutes or until golden and crisp. Drain on paper towel and serve with salt and lemon wedges. Note: Small prawns such as these can be eaten whole, shell and all!
